string.name: desc
string.value: A research monkey that helps Dr. Bing with his experiments...by posing as the test subject! This little monkey wears a suit as protection from the atmosphere.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a Visitor Research Monkey but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: descD
string.value: Your snuggly Teddy has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious cake, baked to celebrate MapleStory's Anniversary!

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: A playful and active Welsh Corgi.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Corgi Pup has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Metus, a mischievous demon who preys on fear.

string.name: descD
string.value: A pet whose life will never expire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Behold, the cute and talented Butterfly!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Butterfly has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Axel, a gentle and well-behaved chihuahua.

string.name: descD
string.value: Axell has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A curious construct, this Stickman pet will be happy to join in your adventures.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a curious construct Stickman, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: desc
string.value: A bouncy little kangaroo who thinks he's the toughest guy this side of the outback.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Kangaroo has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the RED Rudolph! It broke through El Nath's wolf packs and got here just for the RED Patch.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your RED Rudolph has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Craw is a chatty parrot who keeps watch from the crow's nest of pirate ships.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your chatty parrot, Craw, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bonkey the gorilla acts as helmsman and powder monkey aboard a pirate ship.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your reliable powder monkey/gorilla, Bonkey, has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shark in a bowl. Designed by Cristophery.

string.name: descD
string.value: Shark has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your very own tiny Gollux, cleansed and ready for friendship.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your tiny, yet tough Gollux has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: This Fashionista Koala pet is inanimate, having lost the Water of Life. Special magic is required to revive it.

string.name: descD
string.value: Merlion has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life. .

string.name: desc
string.value: Cute and cuddly Merlion. It's still a baby, so you'll have to take extra care not to hurt its feelings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A donkey with wings that thinks its an adventurer. It may be a bit clumsy, but its still kinda cute.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Blue Burro has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Very outgoing and mature; doesn't need to be fed all the time. An intelligent pet that easily understands the commands from the master.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was a cute little Red Elly, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life...

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your cute dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A colt with wings that thinks its an adventurer. It may be a bit clumsy, but its still kinda cute.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your winged Brown Burro has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lady Hot Tea is elegant and a soulful. She has a flowery scent, and is rumored to get along well with Mr. Milk.

string.name: descD
string.value: It was an elegant and soulful Lady Hot Tea, but with the "Water of Life" all dried up, it turned back into a doll. A little magic can bring it back to life, however...

string.name: desc
string.value: Ballet Lyn came from the Toy World.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Toy World pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Soldier Hong came from the Toy World.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Toy World pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Candle pet that shines ever so brightly.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Candle pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This little trickster just loves Halloween.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this the REAL Von Bon? \nHide your watch!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your mini Root Abyss pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This little goon just loves Halloween.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This little hooligan just loves Halloween.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sinister Pumpkin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A great and regal dragon who carries the legendary Dragon Orb.

string.name: descD
string.value: Storm Dragon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your mischievous Devil has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Fennec Foxt has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A romantic fox from the desert. It claims to be from asteroid B-612.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your mini Root Abyss pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this the REAL Pierre? \nHide your tiny cars!

string.name: descD
string.value: Your perfect little Angel has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute little wooden toy who talks, eats, cries and everything!

string.name: descD
string.value: When Mario the Rebel has turned into a doll. You can revive it with Water of life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Ill Orchid is so weak.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your feeble friend Ill Orchid has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your playful chipmunk pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your playful chipmunk pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Lil' Lotus pet is quiet.

string.name: descD
string.value: Quiet Lil' Lotus has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This adorable cat belonged to a witch. Rumor has it, he can speak.

string.name: descD
string.value: Salem the Cat has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: This adorable cat belonged to a witch. Rumor has it, she can sense evil.

string.name: descD
string.value: Binx the Cat has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Bichon has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Yodeling Hen! What a great way to ring in the Year of the Rooster! At least until it drives you crazy.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Yodeling Hen has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mystical frog from the forests of Arboren and friend of Chase.

string.name: descD
string.value: Lil Tutu has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your Fuzzy Dog pet has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格比较文静,不会经常觉得饿.\n但是它不爱听主人的话...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格开朗,好动,很容易饿.不过\n听从主人的命令...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温柔,饭量小.头脑聪明,比\n较听话.但是固执起来谁也没有\n办法...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格活泼,好动,容易饿.但是很\n机灵...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格比较文静,不会经常觉得饿.\n但是它不爱听主人的话...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温柔,饭量小.头脑聪明,比\n较听话.但是固执起来谁也没有\n办法.

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格开朗.但有时候比较文静.饭\n量不多.聪明,很听话.

string.name: desc
string.value:
性格温顺,又有点懒懒的稀有宠
物,而且经常会开玩笑,可是固执
起来谁也没办法,由于经常出国,
还会几句洋文!

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格很活泼,但很容易肚子饿,所\n以要经常给喂它.不太聪明,但很\n善良而可爱.

string.name: desc
string.value: 活动力强,并有神秘气息的雄性\n小恐龙,据说它还有女朋友...

string.name: desc
string.value: 活动力强,并有神秘气息的雌性\n小恐龙,据说它还有男朋友...

string.name: desc
string.value: 生性开朗,好奇心强,但有时我行\n我素...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温顺的小白虎,即使是陌生\n人也会马上变得很亲密...

string.name: desc
string.value: 既单纯又乖巧的大象.因为心地\n善良所以很容易受伤, 对吃的特\n别积极...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格有点文静.但圣诞老人选择\n它以后性格变得很活泼了.是一\n个很善良而且可爱的小驯鹿...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格有点文静.但圣诞老人选择\n它以后性格变得很活泼了.是一\n个很善良而且可爱的小驯鹿...

string.name: desc
string.value:
云豹长期生活在树上，他的名字
来源于身上类似云朵的图案。兼
具力量与美丽于一身的云豹，由
于本身有一种高贵气质，迄今为
止拥有它的人甚少。

string.name: desc
string.value: 天才博士制作的机器人. 虽然是\n机器但是拥有人类的情感...

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格开朗.但有时候比较文静.饭\n量不多.聪明,很听话...

string.name: desc
string.value: 小白雪人会默默地陪在主人身边\n,是个值得信赖的好伙伴!它会默\n默地为主人完成很多事情喔!

string.name: desc
string.value: 生性开朗,好奇心很重,带有自己\n的聊天窗口与名牌...

string.name: desc
string.value: 又淘气又活泼的总能让人快乐\n的小火鸡.搞笑的表情是它的特\n技...

string.name: desc
string.value:
胖嘟嘟的身体让它左倾右斜,但
还是很卖力的勤劳的小企鹅.听
从主人的吩咐,又时不时撒撒娇.
..

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以信赖的活泼的蝙蝠怪,虽然\n长的一副BOSS样,但经常会害羞.\n

string.name: desc
string.value:
飞天遁地、无所不能的齐天大圣
!它绝对是你最得力的助手.若与
孙悟空套装组一起搭配,将会出
现特效...

string.name: desc
string.value: 闪闪发出金色光芒的小金猪.拥\n有它说不定会有意外的好运.

string.name: desc
string.value:
悠然自得、拥有强烈个人风格的
天蓬元帅猪八戒！它绝对是您最
得力的助手。若与猪八戒套装组
一起搭配，将会出现特效。

string.name: desc
string.value: 龙族所赋予的龙蛋,即将会孵化\n出宝贝龙...

string.name: desc
string.value: 从龙蛋中孵化出来的宝贝龙.当\n等级达15级,便可利用进化之石,\n透过NPC迦尔努斯加以进化...

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为绿龙!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为红龙!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为蓝龙!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为黑龙!

string.name: desc
string.value: 黑色兔子,有点没大没小的,喜欢\n被主人教训...

string.name: desc
string.value:
在万圣节诞生的可爱的鬼灵精怪
.由于还处在婴儿时期,虽然是死
神但没有任何威胁,它非常喜欢
与人相处...

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力，进化而成为红龙\n！

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格开朗.但有时候比较文静.饭\n量不多.聪明,很听话...

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱、好奇心强的小猴子。

string.name: desc
string.value: 毛茸茸的刺猬,虽然有很多尖刺,\n但还是很可爱...

string.name: desc
string.value:
할로윈 데이에 태어난 귀여운 
아기사신입니다. 영혼을 거두
어가는 무서운 존재이지만, 친
구가 될 수만 있다면 이보다 
신비로운 존재는 없을 것입니
다. #c스킬: 메소 줍기, 아이템 
줍기, 소유권 없는 아이템与메
소 줍기, 자동 줍기, 이동반경
 확대, MP 물약충전#

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱又活泼的小雪娃娃．虽然有\n时比较默但宠着它的话,它也会\n撒娇．

string.name: desc
string.value: 特别喜欢闪烁的石头,性格开朗\n的花蘑菇仔.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱又活泼的小雪娃娃．虽然有\n时比较默但宠着它的话，它也会\n撒娇．

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温顺的橙色老虎,即使是陌\n生人也会马上变得很亲密...

string.name: desc
string.value: 特别喜欢闪烁的石头，性格开朗\n的花蘑菇仔.

string.name: desc
string.value: 机器人所赋予的胶囊,即将会孵\n化出娃娃机器人...

string.name: desc
string.value:
从罗伯中孵化出来的娃娃机器人
.当等级达15级,便可利用进化之
石,透过NPC迦尔努斯加以进化..
.

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为机器\n人(蓝色)!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为机器\n人(红色)!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为机器\n人(绿色)!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为机器\n人(金色)!

string.name: desc
string.value: 透过魔法之力,进化而成为大猩\n猩机器人!

string.name: desc
string.value: 实在是不知道在想什么的蜗牛..\n.

string.name: desc
string.value: 今年圣诞的大明星,水晶银圣诞\n鹿,高贵温顺,只在每年的圣诞节\n才有机会拥有哦!

string.name: desc
string.value: 从太平洋空运过来的巨嘴鸟，空\n降到冒险岛世界。由于其造型非\n常搞笑又很极品而深得人心。

string.name: desc
string.value: 玩具鸭又傻又勤奋,天性随和,容\n易取悦,喜欢美食和游泳...

string.name: desc
string.value: 一只通过女神镜子召唤而来的宠\n物.矮矮胖胖却喜怒无常.#c拥有永\n恒的生命#

string.name: desc
string.value: 一隻經由女神鏡子召喚而來的寵\n物，矮矮胖胖卻喜怒無常。

string.name: desc
string.value: 似乎会给人带来福气喜气的可爱\n黄金猪。

string.name: desc
string.value: 喜欢游泳的可爱的潜水鸭。

string.name: desc
string.value: 幸运宠,全身上下散发着金色光\n芒的小老虎啊呜啊呜.

string.name: desc
string.value:
旅行地球的時候不小心一個人留
在地球的外星寵物，因為聽不懂
人話所以很悶，喜歡外星事物的
人可以收養他。無法裝備寵物通
用裝備(紅絲帶、寵物帽子、蕾
絲帽、紳士帽)。

string.name: desc
string.value: 2010年幸运宠,全身上下散发着\n金色光芒的小老虎-啊呜啊呜.

string.name: desc
string.value: 机器人所赋予的胶囊，即将会孵\n化出娃娃机器人。

string.name: desc
string.value: 与主人定下约定的玛瑙龙宝宝。

string.name: desc
string.value: 与主人定下约定的玛瑙龙宝宝。

string.name: desc
string.value: 喜欢撒娇的可爱的小象。

string.name: desc
string.value: 活泼调皮的威尔士柯基狗宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 漂浮在空中的神奇鲸鱼。喜欢吃\n虾，而且很听主人的话。

string.name: desc
string.value: 很娇傲，但也很会撒娇的波斯猫\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 神秘的独角兽安塞尔。和心灵相\n通的朋友见面的话，好像会发生\n惊人的事情。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱又好吃的纪念版蛋糕宠物.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱又好吃的纪念版馅饼宝宝.

string.name: desc
string.value:
黑色兔子，有点没大没小的，喜
欢被主人教训。当相应宠物的魔
法时间结束时，宠物技能也会一
并消失。

string.name: desc
string.value:
黑色兔子，有点没大没小的，喜
欢被主人教训。当相应宠物的魔
法时间结束时，宠物技能也会一
并消失。

string.name: desc
string.value: 高贵的独角兽迪埃尔。和安塞尔\n一起，等待心灵相通的朋友。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的独角兽吉尼。喜欢和埃塞\n尔和迪埃尔在一起的娇宝宝。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的独角兽埃塞尔。和心灵相\n通的朋友见面的话，好像会发生\n惊人的事情。

string.name: desc
string.value: 优雅的独角兽迪埃尔。和埃塞尔\n一起，等待心灵相通的朋友。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的独角兽吉尼。喜欢和埃塞\n尔和迪埃尔在一起的娇宝宝。

string.name: desc
string.value:
小白雪人#c珍稀版#，会默默地陪在
主人身边，是个值得信赖的好伙
伴！它会默默地为主人完成很多
事情喔！

string.name: desc
string.value: 雪犬#c珍稀版#。性格开朗，但有时\n候比较文静。饭量不多。聪明，\n很听话。

string.name: desc
string.value: 小象#c珍稀版#，喜欢撒娇的可爱小\n白象。

string.name: desc
string.value: 鱼缸中的小鲨鱼，永久宠物。由\nCristophery设计。

string.name: desc
string.value: 特别喜欢闪烁的石头,性格开朗\n的花蘑菇仔.#c拥有永恒的生命.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温顺的小白虎,即使是陌生\n人也会马上变得很亲密.#c拥有永\n恒的生命.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到威舍的魔法,而诞生的#c小白\n雪人#.#c拥有永恒的生命.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 与主人定下约定的玛瑙龙宝宝。

string.name: desc
string.value: 一只通过女神镜子召唤而来的宠\n物。矮矮胖胖却喜怒无常。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以信赖的活泼的蝙蝠怪，虽然\n长的一副首领怪样，但经常会害\n羞。

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet Gingerhead who started following humans to avoid being eaten.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your sweet Gingerhead Man has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: descD
string.value: This Fashionista Koala pet is inanimate, having lost the Water of Life. Special magic is required to revive it.

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格比较文静，不会经常觉得饿\n。但是它不爱听主人的话。

string.name: desc
string.value: 鱼缸中的小鲨鱼，永久宠物，可\n以和主人走得一样快。

string.name: desc
string.value: 生活在魔法森林的鱼尾狮。

string.name: desc
string.value: 使用魔法的力量可以不停行动的\n神奇猫。

string.name: desc
string.value: 由于防腐剂的作用，可以永远活\n动的神奇饼干。

string.name: desc
string.value:
装备神马可获得 #c神马的惊人祝
福(物理攻击, 魔法攻击 +13) 
可以和其他宠物一起使用(最多3
只)，但装备多只神马时，神马
的惊人祝福不会叠加

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱能干的品克缤。在可爱的外\n表下，好像隐藏着秘密。

string.name: desc
string.value: 忠诚的威尔士柯基犬。它是小巧\n活泼的哔吆的好伙伴。

string.name: desc
string.value: 我是爱唠叨的鹦鹉啾啾。在海盗\n船上担任观察兵职务。

string.name: desc
string.value: 沉默寡言的海獭阿德里亚诺。在\n海盗船上担任航海士职务。

string.name: desc
string.value: 拥有健壮体魄的大猩猩崩克。在\n海盗船上担任装弹兵和舵手职务\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 浪漫的沙漠狐。自称是从小行星\nB612上来的。

string.name: desc
string.value: 忠诚的威尔斯柯基犬。和小巧开\n朗的哔吆是好朋友。

string.name: desc
string.value:
性格温顺，又有点懒懒的纪念宠
物，而且经常会开玩笑，可是固
执起来谁也没办法，由于经常出
国，还会几句洋文！经过特殊
训练，有和其他熊猫不一样的技
能。注：该宠物到期后自动消
失#

string.name: desc
string.value: 虽然走路很吃力，但还是摇摇摆\n摆地努力做事的勤奋的企鹅。很\n听主人的话，很爱撒娇。

string.name: desc
string.value: 喜欢航海的海盗鹦鹉，是海盗们\n的好朋友。

string.name: desc
string.value: 顽皮的魔族火红小恶魔，是代表\n着恐怖的存在。

string.name: desc
string.value: 具有阴暗气息的幽青小恶魔，代\n表着死亡的存在。

string.name: desc
string.value: 野丫头魔族雷黄小恶魔，激发别\n人嫉妒心理的存在。

string.name: desc
string.value: 非常善良的浣熊，对食物没有抵\n抗力，特别喜欢吃杯面。

string.name: desc
string.value: 自认为是冒险家的小马驹，还有\n一对翅膀。虽然有点大大咧咧，\n但还是很可爱。

string.name: desc
string.value: 曾经与希拉一起的黑暗精灵。性\n格有些高傲，爱看不起人。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱又会撒娇的小海豹，很容易\n被别人的话伤害到，所以要特别\n留心照顾。

string.name: desc
string.value: 非常活泼的小绵羊朵朵。活泼的\n性格和可爱动作就是小绵羊朵朵\n最大的魅力了。

string.name: desc
string.value: 鱼缸中的小鲨鱼，可以和主人走\n得一样快。

string.name: desc
string.value:
假小子魔族迪亚。引起心中嫉妒
之情的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能
获得#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装
备的魔族宠物种类越多，该技能
就越强。

string.name: desc
string.value:
阴郁的魔族默斯。守护所有沉默
的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能获得
#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装备的
魔族宠物种类越多，该技能就越
强。

string.name: desc
string.value:
淘气鬼魔族魔翼之弓。引起恐怖
的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能获得
#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装备的
魔族宠物种类越多，该技能就越
强。

string.name: desc
string.value:
淘气鬼魔族魔翼之弓。引起恐怖
的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能获得
#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装备的
魔族宠物种类越多，该技能就越
强。

string.name: desc
string.value:
阴郁的魔族默斯。守护所有沉默
的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能获得
#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装备的
魔族宠物种类越多，该技能就越
强。

string.name: desc
string.value:
假小子魔族迪亚。引起心中嫉妒
之情的魔族。装备魔族宠物就能
获得#c魔族的高贵祝福技能#，且装
备的魔族宠物种类越多，该技能
就越强。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱温顺的小流星。来感受一下\n亲切可爱的小流星的魅力吧。

string.name: desc
string.value: 爱撒娇的可爱啊呜啊呜。

string.name: desc
string.value:
生活在鱼缸里的鲨鱼。装备鱼缸
里的鲨鱼宠物后，可获得#c最强鲨
鱼技能#，装备的鲨鱼宠物越多，
该技能就越强。（最大3只）

string.name: desc
string.value:
可以改变颜色的软乎乎的品克缤
。装备软乎乎的品克缤宠物后，
可获得#c品克缤狂人技能#，装备的
软乎乎的品克缤越多，该技能就
越强。（最大3只）

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的粉红龙。装备龙宠物后，\n可获得#c龙的惊人祝福技能#，装备\n的龙宠物越多，该技能就越强。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的红色龙。装备龙宠物后，\n可获得#c龙的惊人祝福技能#，装备\n的龙宠物越多，该技能就越强。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的冰龙。装备龙宠物后，可\n获得#c龙的惊人祝福技能#，装备的\n龙宠物越多，该技能就越强。

string.name: desc
string.value: 阿别是一只活泼好动的吉娃娃。

string.name: desc
string.value:
可爱的米小熊。装备米小熊宠物
，可以获得#c因为熊#技能。装备小
熊宠物的种类越多，该技能越强
。

string.name: desc
string.value: 艾克索是一只温柔、乖巧的吉娃\n娃。

string.name: desc
string.value: 阿黛尔是一只高贵、典雅的吉娃\n娃。

string.name: desc
string.value:
带有翅膀的爱马士是个冒险者。
标志性的蓝色特殊肤色，实足彰
显水工范儿，让小伙伴们都惊呆
了。

string.name: desc
string.value: 调皮的万圣节南瓜杰克。

string.name: desc
string.value: 调皮的万圣节南瓜奥克。

string.name: desc
string.value: 调皮的万圣节南瓜兰顿。

string.name: desc
string.value: 将帅气的城市兔子当作模特的潮\n流兔子。可以通过冒险岛个性装\n扮系统获得。

string.name: desc
string.value: 与主人定下约定的跳跳袋鼠。

string.name: desc
string.value:
相当挑剔，喜恶分明的刺猬，但
是仔细听它说就会知道，它有着
一颗非常爱主人的心。当相应宠
物的魔法时间结束时，宠物技能
也会一并消失。 #c技能： 拾取金
币、拾取道具#

string.name: desc
string.value: 浪漫的沙漠狐，自称来自小行星\nB612。当相应宠物的魔法时间结\n束时，宠物技能也会一并消失。

string.name: desc
string.value:
装备豆豆蛇可获得 #c豆豆蛇的惊
人祝福(物理攻击, 魔法攻击 +1
3) 可以和其他宠物一起使用(最
多3只)，但装备多只豆豆蛇时，
豆豆蛇的惊人祝福不会叠加 技
能:自动使用增益效果，自动捡
道具，自动捡金币#

string.name: desc
string.value: 生活在魔法森林的鱼尾狮。

string.name: desc
string.value: 鲁塔比斯的变化多端皇后。

string.name: desc
string.value: 圆嘟嘟带点婴儿肥的蜜桃鲁提。

string.name: desc
string.value: 圆嘟嘟带点婴儿肥的薄荷鲁提。

string.name: desc
string.value: 由于害怕被吃掉而跟着人走的战\n战兢兢的姜饼人。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是操控心智的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是谎言和欺诈的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n他会使用幻术迷惑人类。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是操控心智的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是谎言和欺诈的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n他会使用幻术迷惑人类。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是操控心智的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n她是谎言和欺诈的魔鬼。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从地狱召唤出来的可爱小魔犬。\n他会使用幻术迷惑人类。

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是不是真正的血腥女王？要\n时刻小心背后！

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是不是真正的半半？不能因\n为可爱而小看他，会出大事的！

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是不是真正的皮埃尔？虽然\n变小了却还能感觉到的这个邪恶\n感是什么

string.name: desc
string.value:
从三藏法师那里偷偷逃出来的孙
悟空，经常偷懒，非常善变，但
若用爱去感化，或许能有所改变
。

string.name: desc
string.value:
有时候很活泼，有时候看上去又
很庄重，只要适当给一点食物即
可。非常伶俐，很听主人的话。
当相应宠物的魔法时间结束时，
宠物技能也会一并消失。

string.name: desc
string.value: 动作独特的可爱火柴人宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 去见一下正在泡澡的半半。

string.name: desc
string.value: 想变得更加勇敢的小雷昂宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 想得到宠爱的MINI奥尔卡宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 想变得性感的MINI希拉宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 向着明天！向着黄昏的地平线全\n力奔跑的热血袋鼠。

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the RED Yeti! It lives in the caves near Zakum but it got here just for the RED Patch.

string.name: descD
string.value: Your RED Mini Yeti has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value:
性格温顺，又有点懒懒的稀有宠
物，而且经常会开玩笑，可是固
执起来谁也没办法，由于经常出
国，还会几句洋文！

string.name: desc
string.value: 发出明亮的光的蜡烛宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 发出明亮的光的蜡烛宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 发出明亮的光的蜡烛宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 被净化的#c贝勒德#缩小版。

string.name: descD
string.value: Your RED Penguin has turned into a doll. You can revive it with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: 甜美的猕猴桃泡芙宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 滋润甜美的芒果泡芙宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 心地善良的快乐豆豆宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 圆乎乎的猫咪小阿尔礼包。

string.name: desc
string.value:
起源之塔的最后一个首领怪，桃
乐丝的宠物犬拓拓，和在桃乐丝
身边时不同，是个可爱又纯真的
家伙。注意！该宠物的魔法时间
无法延长，当相应宠物的魔法时
间结束时，宠物技能也会一并消
失。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是可爱宠物焦糖娃娃。

string.name: desc
string.value:
疯狂科学家发明的科学怪狗。还
不是完全状态，偶尔会漏电。但
马马虎虎还能过得去的小可爱。
虽然笨，但很讨人喜欢。

string.name: desc
string.value: 来自玩具王国的芭蕾舞女孩丽恩\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 非常可爱的皇家虾宠物，金黄黄\n的，萌萌哒。

string.name: desc
string.value: 非常可爱的皇家虾宠物，金黄黄\n的，萌萌哒。#c技能：道具收集#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c属性：香狐（紫）#柔和型美狐宠
物。装备绝世美狐宠物后，可以
获得#c绝世美狐宠物增益#，变身后
可以获得额外的增益技能。#c技能
：自动发动增益，拾取金币，拾
取道具#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c属性：天狐（青）#叛逆型美狐宠
物。装备绝世美狐宠物后，可以
获得#c绝世美狐宠物增益#，变身后
可以获得额外的增益技能。#c技能
：自动发动增益，拾取金币，拾
取道具#

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是可爱宠物曲奇娃娃。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是可爱宠物可可娃娃。

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道在想什么事情的蜗牛。

string.name: desc
string.value: 来自玩具王国的小士兵阿红。

string.name: desc
string.value: 来自玩具王国的小士兵阿蓝。

string.name: desc
string.value: 所有人的明星——小希爱拉。唯\n一一种被允许在Star Planet与\n主人并肩同行的宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 所有人的明星——小瑞恩。唯一\n一种被允许在Star Planet与主\n人并肩同行的宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: Star Planet的吉祥物！Star Pl\nanet的指引者小亚敏。

string.name: desc
string.value: 孤独雪人。虽然很安静，但却很\n聪明，能做很多事情。

string.name: desc
string.value:
优雅并感情丰富的红茶妹。可以
感受到丰富的味道和花香。据说
和牛奶君在一起，味道会更柔软
。

string.name: desc
string.value: 话少性格酷酷的绿抹茶君。带点\n甜味的绿抹茶对减肥有帮助，深\n受女人喜爱。

string.name: desc
string.value: 健康状况极为糟糕的怜弱奥尔卡\n宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value:
开朗健康的咖啡弟。凭着适当的
糖度，深受男女老少所有的喜爱
。他的好友还有棉花糖，鲜奶油
，绵白糖。

string.name: desc
string.value: 新小海豹的密友新粉色海豹宠物\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 新粉色海豹的密友新小海豹宠物\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从朋友那里收到的新小海豹宠物\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从朋友那里收到的新粉色海豹宠\n物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是三只天下无敌的橘子家族\n宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的埃尔文狗狗宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 拥有霸王的领导力，同时又非常\n可爱的小乌鲁斯宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 一个甜甜的姜饼人，为了不让自\n己被吃掉决定成为人类的伙伴。

string.name: desc
string.value: 机灵的曲奇熊马卡龙宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 甜美的香蕉熊马卡龙宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 豪爽的草莓熊马卡龙宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 孤独品克缤的朋友，软乎乎的品\n克缤。

string.name: desc
string.value: 橙子们团结一心堆叠起来，变得\n比无比强大！

string.name: desc
string.value: 从冒险岛2到冒险岛世界来玩的\n魔力鸭宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是喵星人团的团长小奈落。

string.name: desc
string.value: 小可爱扎昆，和首领怪扎昆不同\n，小扎昆非常可爱、纯真，拥有\n一颗善良火热的心。

string.name: desc
string.value:
别看我长的丑，可是我活的久。
虽然我长的胖胖的，看起来懒洋
洋的，但是我拥有一颗温柔的心
。温柔是我的天性，永生是我的
技能。

string.name: desc
string.value: 淘气的小狐猴，有时却是一副呆\n萌无比的样子。

string.name: desc
string.value: 优雅又喜欢装蒜的波斯猫宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 假小子魔族迪亚，引起心中嫉妒\n之情的魔族。

string.name: desc
string.value: 浪漫的沙漠狐，自称来自小行星\nB612。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是三只可爱的猫鼬宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 小乌龟奈奈宠物，是橡果侦探团\n长的好伙伴。

string.name: desc
string.value: 性格温柔，饭量小。头脑聪明，\n比较听话。但是固执起来谁也没\n有办法。

string.name: desc
string.value: 小青蛙嘟嘟宠物，是橡果侦探团\n长的好伙伴。

string.name: desc
string.value: 小老虎灵灵宠物，是橡果侦探团\n长的好伙伴。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在嘴里慢慢融化的绵软蛋糕宠物\n。装备无敌的甜品宠物后，将获\n得#c尝一口吧技能#。

string.name: desc
string.value:
有着柔软暖和皮毛的可爱宠物粉
色小熊猫，虽然长相可爱，但其
实发起狠来异常凶残，这点可要
小心……

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱，但看起来愤怒的小猎犬。

string.name: descD
string.value: Lil Damien has turned into a doll. You can revive him with the Water of Life.

string.name: desc
string.value: 女巫的宠物猫，可爱的小黑喵。

string.name: desc
string.value: 女巫的宠物猫，淘气的小灰喵。

string.name: desc
string.value: 女巫的宠物猫，稚气的小白喵。

string.name: desc
string.value:
有着奢华柔软皮毛的可爱宠物黄
金小熊猫，虽然长相可爱，但其
实发起狠来异常凶残，这点可要
小心……

string.name: desc
string.value:
可爱的黑色路西德。装备路西德
系列宠物，就能获得#c路西德的庆
典技能#，装备的路西德系列宠物
种类越多，相应技能就能得到强
化。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在2017散发着神秘气息的神鸡。

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是真的魔鬼鱼还是有人故意\n这么打扮的呢.

string.name: desc
string.value: 真不明白我为什么在这里。

string.name: desc
string.value: 阿尔卡那的小不点精灵宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 炸虾宠物。虽然外表很可爱，但\n其实是不死系宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可爱的萌小鸡，成天一副呆萌呆\n萌的样子。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在#c冒险岛M的平安与你同在！#无\n比可怕的首领怪扎昆变成了小扎\n昆。

string.name: desc
string.value: 将领地扩张到宇宙的奥尔卡。

string.name: desc
string.value: 追着奥尔卡来到了宇宙中。

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是真的河豚还是有人故意这\n么打扮的呢.

string.name: desc
string.value: 到底是真的咸鱼还是有人故意这\n么打扮的呢.

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c花栗鼠\n#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c懒懒熊\n#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 带有生命力的神秘卡车。

string.name: desc
string.value: 带有生命力的神秘出租车。

string.name: desc
string.value: 带有生命力的神秘巴士。

string.name: desc
string.value: 拥有雪白皮毛的北极熊。

string.name: desc
string.value: 模样时髦的约克夏梗犬。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c粉绿小鹿#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c迷你绿\n水灵#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c蛋黄刺\n猬#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c天蓝刺\n猬#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c粉嫩刺\n猬#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c胖小啾\n#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 从魔法宠物果实中诞生的#c迷你白\n雪人#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c粉红小鹿#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c粉紫小鹿#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c流心蛋#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c白煮蛋#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 凭借魔法之力永动的奇迹路西德\n宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 凭借魔法之力永动的奇迹路西德\n宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c甘迪宝宝#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c马斯特玛#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 在威舍的魔法作用下，从奇趣梅\n中诞生的#c茶叶蛋#。

string.name: desc
string.value: 凭借魔法之力永动的奇迹路西德\n宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到威舍的魔法,而诞生的#c小白\n雪人#.#c拥有永恒的生命.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 实在是不知道在想什么的蜗牛。

string.name: desc
string.value: 虽然是缩小版的，但依然很稳重\n的#c小南哈特#。

string.name: desc
string.value:
相当爱恨分明又挑剔的刺猬。但
是若好好听它说话与它交流，会
发现它有一颗非常关爱主人的心
。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：香狐（紫）#柔和型美狐宠\n物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：玉狐（绿）#稳重型美狐宠\n物。

string.name: name
string.value: 恶魔- 路易斯凹凸曼

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：路易斯（光）# 勇敢的恶\n魔凹凸曼宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 呼噜喵软软的肚皮比被子更暖和\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 困喵喵萌萌的前爪比枕头更松软\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 睡喵喵总是眯着眼，讨厌晃眼的\n光线。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是小小死灵戴米安宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 这是小小死灵斯乌宠物。

string.name: name
string.value: 恶魔- 坦帕斯凹凸曼

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：坦帕斯（时间）#慎重的恶\n魔凹凸曼宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：维他（生命）#慈祥的恶\n魔凹凸曼宠物。

string.name: name
string.value: 魔鬼- 路易斯凹凸曼

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：路易斯（光）)#勇敢的魔\n鬼凹凸曼宠物。

string.name: name
string.value: 魔鬼- 坦帕斯凹凸曼

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：坦帕斯（时间）#慎重的魔\n鬼凹凸曼宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：维他（生命）#慈祥的魔鬼\n凹凸曼宠物。

string.value: #c属性：天狐（青）#叛逆型美狐宠\n物。

string.value: #c属性：香狐（紫）#柔和型美狐宠\n物。

string.value: #c属性：玉狐（绿）#稳重型美狐宠\n物。

string.value: #c属性：天狐（青）#叛逆型美狐宠\n物。

string.value: #c属性：天狐（青）#叛逆型绝世美\n狐宠物。

string.value: #c属性：香狐（紫）#柔和型美狐宠\n物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：玉狐（绿）#稳重型美狐宠\n物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：卢娜（月亮）#一只沉着温\n柔的银河独角兽宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：索尔（太阳）#一只热情火\n爆的彩虹精灵宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：卢娜（月亮）#一只沉着温\n柔的彩虹小马宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：斯特拉（星星）#一只活泼\n开朗的彩虹小马宠物。

string.name: desc
string.value: #c属性：索尔（太阳）#一只热情火\n爆的彩虹小马宠物。

string.value: #c属性：斯特拉（星星）#一只活泼\n开朗的彩虹精灵宠物。

string.value: #c属性：天狐（青）#叛逆型美狐宠\n物。
